major_arcana.0: The Fool: A young man stands on the edge of a cliff, carefree and embarking on a new journey, with a small dog barking at his heels, holding a white rose, bright sun in the background
major_arcana.1: The Magician: A figure stands with one hand pointing to the sky and the other to the earth, symbols of the four suits on a table before him, representing manifestation and power, infinity symbol above head
major_arcana.2: The High Priestess: A woman sits between two pillars, one black and one white, holding a scroll of secret knowledge, moon at her feet, veil of pomegranates behind her, mysterious and intuitive
major_arcana.3: The Empress: A beautiful woman sits on a throne in a lush garden, wearing a crown of stars, holding a scepter, shield with venus symbol, representing fertility, abundance, and nature
major_arcana.4: The Emperor: A stern man sits on a stone throne decorated with rams' heads, holding a scepter and orb, red robes, mountains in the background, representing authority, structure, and fatherhood
major_arcana.5: The Hierophant: A religious figure sits between two pillars, right hand raised in blessing, two crossed keys at his feet, two acolytes kneeling before him, representing tradition and spiritual guidance
major_arcana.6: The Lovers: A naked man and woman stand beneath an angel, sun shining above, adam and eve symbolism, snake in a fruit tree, representing love, harmony, and choices
major_arcana.7: The Chariot: A warrior stands in a chariot driven by two sphinxes, one black and one white, starry canopy, holding a wand, city in the background, representing willpower, victory, and determination
major_arcana.8: Strength: A woman gently holds the jaws of a lion, infinity symbol above her head, white dress with flowers, calm and confident, representing courage, compassion, and inner strength
major_arcana.9: The Hermit: An old man stands alone on a snowy mountain peak, holding a lantern with a star inside and a staff, looking down, representing introspection, solitude, and guidance
major_arcana.10: Wheel of Fortune: A large wheel with mysterious symbols, surrounded by the four evangelists, sphinx on top, snake descending, anubis rising, representing destiny, cycles, and change
major_arcana.11: Justice: A figure sits between pillars holding a sword in one hand and scales in the other, purple veil, looking straight ahead, representing fairness, truth, and law
major_arcana.12: The Hanged Man: A man hangs upside down from a T-shaped tree by one foot, halo around his head, calm expression, red legs, blue shirt, representing surrender, new perspective, and sacrifice
major_arcana.13: Death: A skeleton in black armor rides a white horse, carrying a black flag with a white rose, king fallen, child offering flowers, sun rising between towers, representing end, transition, and rebirth
major_arcana.14: Temperance: An angel with one foot on land and one in water pours liquid between two cups, path to mountains and sun in background, iris flowers, representing balance, moderation, and patience
major_arcana.15: The Devil: A winged horned figure sits on a pedestal, a chained man and woman stand naked below, inverted pentagram, torch, black background, representing bondage, materialism, and addiction
major_arcana.16: The Tower: A tall stone tower on a rocky cliff specific struck by lightning, flames bursting from windows, two people falling, crown tofalling off top, representinig sudden change, chaos, and revelation
major_arcana.17: The Star: A naked woman kneels by a pool, pouring water onto land and into the pool, large yellow star and seven small stars in the sky, ibis bird in tree, representing hope, inspiration, and serenity
major_arcana.18: The Moon: A full moon with a face shines between two towers, a wolf and a dog howl, a crayfish crawls out of a pool, long winding path, representing illusion, intuition, and unconscious
major_arcana.19: The Sun: A large bright sun with a face shines in the sky, a naked child rides a white horse holding a red banner, sunflowers growing over a wall, representing joy, success, and vitality
major_arcana.20: Judgement: An angel blows a trumpet in the sky, naked people rise from coffins with arms spread, mountains in background, representing awakening, renewal, and absolution
major_arcana.21: The World: A naked woman dances inside a laurel wreath, holding two wands, surrounded by the four evangelists in corners, representing completion, wholeness, and accomplishment

suits.Wands: element of Fire, red and orange color palette, sprouting wooden staffs, energy, passion, creativity, action
suits.Cups: element of Water, blue and cyan color palette, golden chalices, emotion, relationships, intuition, love
suits.Swords: element of Air, yellow and grey color palette, sharp steel swords, clouds, intellect, conflict, truth, clarity
suits.Pentacles: element of Earth, green and brown color palette, gold coins with pentagrams, nature, material world, career, money, stability

ranks.Ace: a single large object appearing from a cloud, divine gift, new beginning, pure potential
ranks.Two: duality, balance, partnership, planning, waiting, two objects displayed
ranks.Three: expansion, growth, teamwork, initial success, three objects displayed
ranks.Four: stability, foundation, celebration or rest, structure, four objects displayed
ranks.Five: conflict, loss, challenge, struggle, instability, five objects displayed
ranks.Six: victory, nostalgia, harmony, generosity, restoration, six objects displayed
ranks.Seven: defense, choices, perseverance, strategy, challenge, seven objects displayed
ranks.Eight: movement, speed, walking away, diligence, progress, eight objects displayed
ranks.Nine: resilience, satisfaction, anxiety, independence, near completion, nine objects displayed
ranks.Ten: completion, burden, legacy, finality, fullness, ten objects displayed
ranks.Page: young person, messenger, student, curiosity, small potential, holding the suit symbol
ranks.Knight: person on a horse, action, movement, quest, mission, charging forward or steady
ranks.Queen: woman on a throne, maturity, nurturing, introspection, emotional depth, holding the suit symbol
ranks.King: man on a throne, authority, control, mastery, leadership, holding the suit symbol
